lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In announcing the takeover agreement, Chrysler chairman Lee Iacocca cited AMC's Jeep division as well as its new 675 mln dlr assembly plant at Bramalea, Ontario, and its network of 1,200 dealers as the major attractions.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It was "business as usual" yesterday at the American Motors headquarters, one day after the proposed merger was unveiled by Chrysler and AMC's French parent Renault, according to company spokesman Edd Snyder.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But AMC's future, to be discussed at a board meeting today, would be radically different as a Chrysler subsidiary than if it had continued with the state-run French car group as its controlling shareholder.
